name: SNAKE2000
description:
Snake2000 is a procedurally generated snake rogue-like. Consume every bird to progress to the next level. Slither your way through the jungle, graveyard and hell to win the game.

Play with ASDW, the arrow keys or a controller.

SPACE/RETURN to continue.

ESC to exit.

* If you're playing the web version on a laptop, fullscreen might not work properly. Try resizing your browser window or downloading the standalone version <3 *
